text: Annakutty Kodambakkam Vilikkunnu is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jagathy Sreekumar, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Sreeja in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Suresh Gopi as S.I Babu * Sreeja as Annakutty * Saikumar as Chandikunju * Jagathy Sreekumar as Manavedran/Kodampakkaran *Mamukkoya as Koya *Kuthiravattam Pappu as Muringamoottil Mathayi * Innocent as Kariyachan * Krishnankutty Nair * Mala Aravindan as Father Madukkakuzhi * Usha as Ponnamma *Poojappura Ravi as Pillai *Meena as Chinnammu *K.P.A.C. Sunny as Ouseppu *Kollam Thulasi as Dr. Azhakeshan *Jagannatha Varma as Sub Inspector Chandran C.V ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films Category:Films based on Malayalam novels
title: Annakutty Kodambakkam Vilikkunnu
